name: lru-weak-cache
description: A caching Map<string, ?> that deletes the least-recently-accessed items with weak references.

scripts.test-coverage: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --bail --reporter spec --check-leaks test/
scripts.test-travis: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks test/

author: NexusTools <contact@nexustools.com>
